document.docAuthor: Niu, Ze-Qing, Ascher, John S., Griswold, Terry & Zhu, Chao-Dong
document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the bee genus Bathanthidium Mavromoustakis (Hymenoptera: Apoidea Megachilidae: Anthidiini) with description of a new species from China

Anthidium bifoveolatum

, ♀ , ♂ . Type locality: Fukien ( China , Fujian ), not examined.
